attributes.action: Stop using Jaguar cars and the like, and use 'Green' vehicles for Ministerial transport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With all the issues around Global warming and climate change, we are all being told we need to go 'Green'

As a result middle Britain is constantly being hit with ever increasing taxes.

In the budget Mr Darling intends to hit the motorist again, two pence on petrol and £2000 show room taxes on gas gusslers. It never ends.

It is time the Government led by example.Get rid of the Jaguars and the like. Purchase smaller, Eco friendly vehicles, Ford Focus diesel's or similar
to be used as Ministerial vehicle.

It will help the planet, and cost the tax payer less.

Time to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
